title: Phantom C2
description: Undetectable command-and-control framework with built-in EDR evasion (Process Hollowing, API Unhooking). Tested against CrowdStrike/SentinelOne.

title: Neural Network Resolver
description: AI-powered AntiAim resolver for CS:GO HvH using neural networks to predict opponent movements. Built for GameSense with LUA integration.

title: ADBlood 2.0
description: Active Directory attack automation toolkit with novel Kerberoasting/DCSync techniques. Reduced attack time from hours to minutes.

title: JWT Toolkit
description: Automated JWT exploitation suite (alg=none, kid injection, RSA-to-HMAC). Found 50+ vulnerabilities in bug bounties.

title: CloudKnife
description: Multi-cloud pentesting tool (AWS/Azure/GCP) with 20+ automated attack modules for IAM/S3 misconfigurations.

title: APKrypt
description: Android reverse engineering framework with Frida/Xposed automation. Bypassed 10+ banking app protections.

title: RSArmory
description: Educational toolkit demonstrating RSA vulnerabilities (Hastad's broadcast attack, Wiener's theorem).

title: UnpackME
description: Automated malware unpacker handling VMProtect/Themida with YARA rule generator.

title: RF Catcher
description: SDR-based tool for analyzing wireless protocols (Garage doors, RFID, LoRaWAN).

title: BugBot
description: Bug bounty automation framework (subdomain enum, endpoint fuzzing). Earned $250k+ in bounties.

title: PLCrack
description: Modbus TCP fuzzer that discovered vulnerabilities in industrial PLCs (CVE-2023-XXXXX).
